name: Out Of Space (itch) (theloyalstreamer)
description:
"The most confused we ever get is when we're trying to convince our heads of something our heart knows is a lie."

this game is called Out of space. it is a short puzzle game that uses the effect of non-euclidean space.

Controls: WASD to move, SHIFT to run, SPACE to jump.

this game takes up 1GB of storage
